author: iarspider
body:
Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/42747

#### PR description:

testConfigDP frequently times out in PowerPC IBs. This PR, following suggestion in #42747, splits it into multiple smaller tests. 

The splitting is arbitrary, I'm open to suggestions of different ways to split (and definitely open to suggestions of better test names). 

#### PR validation:

Bot tests.
title: Split testConfigDP into smaller parts
